pages.title: Btick Toss
pages.text: A play ability that causes a direct attack for 2 damage. This does not cause the opponent to fight back, but will cause any fight or damaged triggers.

pages.title: Tough Stuff
pages.text: A turn ability that sets Obby's power to 3 if it is less than 3.

pages.title: Radiant Glow
pages.text: A turn ability that causes the power of buddies of the monster grouping to decrease by 1.

pages.title: Bounce Back
pages.text: A death ability that causes Slinky to return to your hand if there is space.

pages.title: Hearty Bacon
pages.text: A death ability that causes you to gain 2 life and gives your other buddies the strength status effect.

pages.title: Soul Steal
pages.text: A kill ability that causes you to gain 1 life.

pages.title: Igneous Extrusion
pages.text: A fight ability that increases Baisal's power by 2 while Baisal is on fire.

pages.title: Warped Growth
pages.text: A fight ability that increases Vinnie's power by 1 if you have another buddy in the fungal grouping in play.

pages.title: Warping Spores
pages.text: A death ability that gives an opposing buddy a sleep ability if there is an opposing buddy. Only triggers if there is an opposing buddy.

pages.title: Spreading Spores
pages.text: A play ability that draws you a card if you have another buddy in the fungal grouping in play.

pages.title: Spicy Flames
pages.text: A damaged ability gives any buddy that deals direct damage to Fyo the fire status effect.

pages.title: Meltdown
pages.text: A play ability that gives all buddies that are not in the fire grouping the fire status effect.

pages.title: Withering Strike
pages.text: A fight ability that gives any opposing buddies the withered status effect.

pages.title: Flaming Shot
pages.text: A 1 power activated ability that gives an opposing buddy a fire status effect and deals 1 damage to it. This damage is indirect and does not cause attack or damage triggers. Can only be activated when opposing a buddy.

pages.title: Subtraction
pages.text: A powered ability that deals 1 damage to an opposing buddy. This damage is indirect and does not cause attack or damage triggers. Will not happen if an opposing buddy is not found.

pages.title: Fire Resistance
pages.text: A death ability that goes through all of your other buddies with the fire status effect and gains them 2 power and clears them of their status effects.

pages.title: Tough Tears
pages.text: A damaged ability that causes Crybaby to gain 1 power. Not all power loss or attacks trigger it, but combat damage does.

pages.title: Spirit Flames
pages.text: A damaged ability gives any buddy that deals direct damage to Fya the fire status effect and causes them to lose 1 power.

pages.title: Soul Light
pages.text: A played ability that causes all enemy buddies in the monster grouping to lose 1 power.

pages.title: Fire Spitball
pages.text: A 2 power activated ability that gives an opposing buddy a fire status effect and deals 2 damage to it. This damage is indirect and does not cause attack or damage triggers. Can only be activated when opposing a buddy.

pages.title: Magmawalk
pages.text: A fight ability that will cancel the fight if you have a buddy from the fire grouping, instead dealing damage equal damage to its power to the opponent.

pages.title: Furious Cocktail
pages.text: A play ability that applies a random status effect to each of your buddies. Each of your buddies will either get strength, regeneration, or resistance.

pages.title: Splashy Potion
pages.text: A 5 energy activation ability that applies a random status effect to each of your opponent's buddies. Each of them will either get poison, weakness, or wither.

pages.title: Hellish Welcome
pages.text: A play ability that gives each of your buddycards from the nether set 1 power, including Port.

pages.title: Unwelcome Visitor
pages.text: A death ability that searches your deck at random 32 times for a buddycard from the nether set. If it finds one before running out of rolls, it will play it for free from your deck, otherwise it will do nothing.

pages.title: Withering Heights
pages.text: A play ability that gives Triple the Airborne status effect.

pages.title: Withering Shot
pages.text: A 2 energy activated ability that deals 2 damage to an opposing buddy and gives them the wither status effect. This is indirect and does not cause attack or damage triggers

pages.title: Charged Respawn
pages.text: An observe death ability that will attempt to save one of your buddies from death by losing 1 power and setting the dying buddy's power to 1. Will only activate while Anker has 1 or more power.

pages.title: Respawn Recharge
pages.text: A 2 energy activated ability that will increase Anker's power by 1.

pages.title: Beacon Buff
pages.text: A play ability that increases each of your other buddies powers by 2.

pages.title: Color Shift
pages.text: A 4 energy activated ability that will choose a random effect between strength, regeneration, and resistance, then give all of your buddies that status effect.

pages.title: Ancient Coating
pages.text: A play ability that will increase each of your buddies' powers by 2, or by 4 if they have the fire status effect or are opposing a buddy in the fire grouping.

pages.title: Gear Upgrade
pages.text: A remove activated ability that will increase each of your other buddies power by 1, or by N-Rite's power if they are in the enchantable grouping. If no buddies would get a buff this way (such as if N-Rite is your only buddy) this will not trigger and N-Rite will not be removed.
